name: Douglas Bandfeild
text: I LOVE Simple Simons. I go at least 3 times a week for the lunch buffet it always fills me up at a great price!

name: Wesley Hochstetler
text: This is a wonderful little pizza place. It reminds me a lot of Pizza Hut but they have much better crust options. I especially love their thin crust as it's wonderfully crispy and cracker like. We recently got some pizza here for a family get together and it was a huge hit for everyone.

name: Anita Pedroza
text: Love the calizone..but this time it was dry..they were quick to try to make me happy..either way still one of my favorites

text: Have been going here since I was young great place and people

text: My walk-in order was completed quickly and the pizza was super delicious. I'll be coming back!

name: Kathryn Martin
text: They have good pizza but bad customer services. Make sure when using the slice app that you make sure they don't over charger you when you get there after you have already paid.
